text: The following lists events that have happened in 1853 in the Qajar dynasty. ==Incumbents== * Monarch: Naser al-Din Shah Qajar ==Births== * March 23 – Mozaffar ad-Din Shah Qajar was born in Tehran ==Events== * May 5 – The Shiraz earthquake shook the region with a maximum Mercalli intensity of IX (Violent), leaving 13,000 dead. ==References== Iran Category:Years of the 19th century in Iran Category:1850s in Iran Iran
title: 1853 in Iran
